En.TALONFLAME_PA1_TEXT_1: While above 85% HP; movement speed is increased by 10%.
En.TALONFLAME_BA1_TEXT_1: Becomes a boosted attack every third attack, creating a fiery whirlwind that deals damage to enemies in the area of effect. This boosted attack remains readied even after leaving combat.
En.TALONFLAME_MOVE_PECK_TEXT_1: Talonflame flies toward a target Pokémon and attacks it three times.
En.TALONFLAME_MOVE_FLAME_CHARGE_TEXT_1: Talonflame dashes forward; damaging enemies in its path. Talonflame gains 30% movement speed for 1.5s after dashing.
En.TALONFLAME_MOVE_FLAME_CHARGE_TEXT_2: For 3s after this move hits; Talonflame's abilities and auto attacks partially ignore the enemies' defense (capped at 0) and enemies hit are slowed by 30% for 5s.
En.TALONFLAME_MOVE_AERIAL_ACE_TEXT_1: Talonflame dashes through a targeted enemy; damaging them and healing Talonflame. Talonflame's next auto attack is boosted.
En.TALONFLAME_MOVE_ACROBATICS_TEXT_1: Talonflame flies toward a targeted area; attacking all Pokémon in the area up to three times. Talonflame can choose a direction to dash after the move ends.
En.TALONFLAME_MOVE_FLY_TEXT_1: Talonflame flies up into the sky; becoming untargetable and increasing movement speed by 65%. After 3s, Talonflame dives at the targeted area, damaging all enemies in the area. Fly can be recast to dive early. This move's cooldown is reduced by 40% if it hits an enemy player. After using this move, the next attack becomes a boosted attack.
En.TALONFLAME_MOVE_FLY_TEXT_2: Enemies hit are also thrown in the air for 0.4s.
En.TALONFLAME_MOVE_BRAVE_BIRD_TEXT_1: Talonflame dives at the targeted area; taking 5% of remaining HP as recoil damage and damaging all enemies in the area. If Talonflame uses a boosted attack on an enemy hit by Brave Bird within 4s, the cooldown of Flame Charge or Aerial Ace is reset. The cooldown of Flame Charge and Aerial Ace can only be reset once per target hit by Brave bird.
En.TALONFLAME_MOVE_BRAVE_BIRD_TEXT_2: Talonflame takes 15% less damage per enemy hit for 5s when this move hits. This damage reduction stacks up to 3 times (capped at 45%).
En.TALONFLAME_MOVE_FLAME_SWEEP_TEXT_1: Talonflame charges forward; damaging and shoving all enemies in its path. Flame Sweep deals damage up to 2 times and Talonflame takes 50% less damage during the sweep.

Cn.TALONFLAME_BA1_TEXT_1: 每三次攻击变为一次增强攻击，制造出炽热的旋风，对范围内的敌人造成伤害。即使在离开战斗后，这种增强的攻击仍然准备就绪。
Cn.TALONFLAME_MOVE_PECK_TEXT_1: Talonflame 飞向目标宝可梦并攻击它 3 次。
Cn.TALONFLAME_MOVE_FLAME_CHARGE_TEXT_1: Talonflame 向前冲；对路径上的敌人造成伤害。冲刺后 Talonflame 获得 30% 的移动速度，持续 1.5 秒。
Cn.TALONFLAME_MOVE_FLAME_CHARGE_TEXT_2: 此招命中后3秒；Talonflame 的技能和自动攻击会部分忽略敌人的防御（上限为 0），并且被击中的敌人会减速 30%，持续 5 秒。
Cn.TALONFLAME_MOVE_AERIAL_ACE_TEXT_1: Talonflame 冲过目标敌人；损坏它们并治疗 Talonflame。Talonflame 的下一次自动攻击得到提升。
Cn.TALONFLAME_MOVE_ACROBATICS_TEXT_1: Talonflame 飞向目标区域；最多攻击范围内的所有宝可梦3次。Talonflame可以在移动结束后选择一个方向冲刺。
Cn.TALONFLAME_MOVE_FLY_TEXT_1: Talonflame 飞向天空；变得无法被选中，移动速度提高 65%。3 秒后，Talonflame 向目标区域俯冲，对该区域内的所有敌人造成伤害。飞行可以重铸为提前潜水。如果击中敌方玩家，此招式的冷却时间会减少 40%。使用此招式后，下一次攻击变为增幅攻击。
Cn.TALONFLAME_MOVE_FLY_TEXT_2: 被击中的敌人也会被抛到空中 0.4 秒。
Cn.TALONFLAME_MOVE_BRAVE_BIRD_TEXT_1: Talonflame 向目标区域俯冲；承受剩余生命值的5%作为后坐力伤害，并对范围内的所有敌人造成伤害。如果 Talonflame 在 4 秒内对被 Brave Bird 击中的敌人使用增强攻击，则重置 Flame Charge 或 Aerial Ace 的冷却时间。Brave bird 每击中一个目标，只能重置一次 Flame Charge 和 Aerial Ace 的冷却时间。
Cn.TALONFLAME_MOVE_BRAVE_BIRD_TEXT_2: 当此招式命中时，Talonflame 在 5 秒内每击中一个敌人就会减少 15% 的伤害。此伤害减免最多叠加 3 次（上限为 45%）。
Cn.TALONFLAME_MOVE_FLAME_SWEEP_TEXT_1: Talonflame 向前冲锋；伤害并推开其路径上的所有敌人。烈焰扫荡造成最多 2 次伤害，而烈焰猛爪在扫荡期间受到的伤害减少 50%。
Cn.TALONFLAME_MOVE_FLAME_SWEEP_TEXT_2: 80% 移动速度，20% 最大生命值护盾
